ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the name of study treatment.

ReferenceDocuments.name: EXTRT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: EXTRT captures the name of the investigational treatment. This is typically collected for open label studies and populated for blinded studies during the SDTM-based dataset creation. Since EXTRT is the SDTMIG topic variable, it is a required variable in SDTM and must have a value in CDASH or a plan to populate it in the SDTM submission datasets (i.e. collected or populated from other sources).

ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 10 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
